document_data.mainbody:
he River Olung was a major river in Chult.
The River Olung flowed from Lake Luo in the Valley of Embers northward to Kitchers Inlet, The river flowed beside the city of Mezro, forming its western and southern borders.
As of the late 15 century DR, it served as an important border between the "ordinary" region of the jungle, and the area that was infested with undead.
Aldani were known to inhabit the deep waters of the Olung, and dragon turtles were found at its mouth.
The bara Mainu also made her home in the waters, appearing a patch of darkness with golden eyes to those who saw her.
